long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Explore different rooms, jump on all sorts of objects: shelves, tables, chairs, sofas, and even subwoofers!Make the bottle jump or even double flip. How? Just tap the screen at the right moment and jump!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Flip Bottle extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click theFlip Bottle icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Flip Bottle popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?

long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Bottle Flip Unblocked Game is an entertaining and addictive game available as a Chrome extension. In this fun-filled challenge, your goal is to flip a virtual bottle and make it land upright on various surfaces. Test your coordination and timing as you flick the bottle with just the right amount of force. With each successful flip, you earn points and unlock new bottle designs. With its simple gameplay, realistic physics, and colorful graphics, "Bottle Flip" delivers an engaging experience. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to play the game directly in your browser. Plus, it's unblocked and free to play on the unblockedgames.ee website, ensuring you can enjoy the bottle-flipping fun without any restrictions. Get ready to master the art of bottle flipping and achieve the perfect landing in "Bottle Flip Unblocked Game"!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Bottle Flip extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Bottle Flip icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Flip Bottle popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tap or Click to play
